channel.title: Generative on Derek Morash
channel.description: Recent content in Generative on Derek Morash

item.title: B Spline
item.description: Horizontal B Spline A recreation of a work by one of my favourite artists, Anders Hoff (Inconvergent), called Sand Spline.

item.title: B Spline Strings
item.description: Horizontal B Spline B Spline system for creating string like images. A similar approach to my B Spline pieces, but in a more minimal style to appear almost hand drawn.
